news.title: No 10 backs Chancellor Rachel Reeves after tearful Commons appearance
news.summary: Rachel Reeves was visibly upset as Keir Starmer came under attack from Kemi Badenoch over welfare bill U-turn.

news.title: Heathrow considering legal action against National Grid over fire that caused shutdown
news.summary: Heathrow says it is considering legal action against National Grid following a report into a fire which led the airport to close.

news.title: Catherine talks candidly of 'life-changing' cancer treatment
news.summary: Catherine says "you put on a sort of brave face" during treatment but afterwards it can also feel "really difficult".

news.title: Family of teenage crash victim Harry Dunn want inquiry report published
news.summary: The teenage motorcyclist died in 2019 after he was struck by Anne Sacoolas's car at RAF Croughton.

news.title: Kuenssberg: Starmer's first year ends in shambles, but could he still turn it around?
news.summary: Labour has been failing its basic mission to look like a capable government. And the PM's authority has been given a kick. But insiders have hope for the year ahead
